amendment.description: To require the Under Secretary of Transportation for Security to reconsider certain applications from airports to authorize passenger and property screening to be carried out by a qualified private screening company and to report to congress if the Under Secretary denies any such application.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5 proposed by Senator Blunt. (consideration: CR S502-503; text: CR S502) To require the Under Secretary of Transportation for Security to reconsider certain applications from airports to authorize passenger and property screening to be carried out by a qualified private screening company and to report to congress if the Under Secretary denies any such application.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5 proposed by Senator Blunt.
